mapper.select: SELECT ES.ESTIID, ES.ESTINAME, ES.MEMID, ES.RESDATE, ES.RESTIME, ES.GUESTNUM, HA.HALLNAME, CA.CATERINGTYPE, STU.STUDIONAME, DR.DRESSNAME, OP.OPTIONNAME, AD.QUANTITY, ES.TOTALCOST FROM ESTIMATES ES join HALL HA on ES.hallid = HA.hallid join CATERING CA on ES.cateringid = CA.cateringid join STUDIO STU on ES.studioid = STU.studioid join DRESS DR on ES.DRESSID = DR.DRESSID join ADDITIONAL AD on ES.ESTIID = AD.ESTIID left join OPTIONS OP on AD.OPTIONID = OP.OPTIONID WHERE ES.MEMID = #{ memid }
